# Bedi Lace Collection - Project Setup Instructions

## Project Overview
React 19 + Vite product showcase website for laces, fabrics, buttons, and stitching materials.

## Tech Stack
- React 19
- Vite
- React Router DOM
- TypeScript definitions
- Framer Motion
- Vitest + Testing Library
- ESLint with React Hooks

## Setup Checklist

- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Install Dependencies
- [ ] Create Folder Structure
- [ ] Setup Routing
- [ ] Create Mock Data
- [ ] Build Layout Components
- [ ] Create Page Skeletons
- [ ] Configure Testing
- [ ] Verify Build

## Business Model
Digital product catalogue only - NO e-commerce functionality.
